main event: Multiple witnesses observed a silver disc-shaped object making a loud roar, which was moving rapidly in the Newburyport, Massachusetts area on April 28, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as having no visible means of propulsion and appeared to hover before ascending quickly., Witnesses reported hearing a loud, intense roar similar to a jet engine., Observations included a unique haze surrounding the object and a bright central region., Witness descriptions varied, noting colors and size estimates from 25 to 30 feet in diameter., The event was reported through Project Blue Book, reflecting multiple credible military witnesses.
witness description: Captains in the USAF and other civilians.
